stimulusHtml: Based on the above table which of the following is most likely correct?

features.html:
The table below shows labor market statistics for a nation.

Number of Workers Structurally Unemployed 3 million
Number of Workers Cyclically Unemployed 4 million
Number of Workers Frictionally Unemployed 2 million
Number of Workers Officially Classified as Employed 91 million
Working-age Population 150 million

choicesHtml: The natural rate of unemployment is 5 percent.
The labor force participation rate is 91 percent.
Discouraged workers are 4 percent of the labor force.
There are 9 million discouraged workers in the nation
There are 95 million people in the labor force
